moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury Protection (PIP)
    It makes more sense to think about PIP insurance as health insurance, rather than automobile insurance. PIP is insurance that pays your medical bills like health insurance when you are hurt in an automobile accident.
  • Automobile Accident
    We can quickly analyze your insurance coverage and the insurance coverage of the person who caused the accident and let you know what your options are.
  • Medical Malpractice & Nursing Home Neglect
    Whether it’s in a hospital or a nursing home, we all have a right to expect the best from those we entrust with our care.
  • Product Liability
    If you are seriously injured by a product, it is worth looking at the design, the manufacture, the instructions and warning that came with the product to see if your injury could have been prevented.
  • Premises Liability
    Any place that is open to the public has a responsibility to maintain that establishment in a safe and clean condition. When an establishment fails to do so, they can be held responsible for injuries that occur as a result of their negligence.

description:
The Pendas Law Firm is a bilingual personal injury firm that represents plaintiffs throughout Florida. Our cases involve: motor vehicle accidents, slip & falls, trucking accidents, pedestrian accidents, premises liability, products liability, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse, personal injury protection (PIP) litigation, insurance claims, whistleblower claims and workplace accidents. We have offices in West Palm Beach, Orlando, Daytona Beach, Tampa, Bradenton, Jacksonville, Fort Myers, Fort Lauderdale, and Miami.

Our founding philosophy is that every individual person and family in need of legal representation should receive service that exceeds expectations, fully addresses all questions and concerns, and that establishes a sense of having been represented by a lawyer who truly cares. Many people are referred to us by past clients who were happy with our services, and we can proudly say that we have earned a reputation in our community for our ability to produce results.

All of our attorneys, paralegals and assisting staff are fluent in Spanish and English, which allows us to intervene on our clients’ behalf at critical moments to clarify misunderstandings and avoid error. We can assist you with insurance claims, personal injury protection (PIP) and uninsured motorist (UM) coverage, and we have experience handling law enforcement, insurance providers and adjustors to protect the interests of our clients in personal injury cases.

Our attorneys have recovered hundreds of thousands of dollars in legal compensation for sustained injuries and losses suffered by our clients. Contact The Pendas Law Firm to schedule a free consultation and to learn about your legal options. We are here to guide your recovery.
